StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [SearchRequests]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @OrgID int = 0, @status int = 0, @type int = 0, @level int = 0 ) AS
SELECT [ID], a.[NWA_GUID], a.FIRST_NAME, a.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, a.LAST_NAME, a.SUFFIX_CD, [RequestTypeID], [FormID], [RequestDate], [RequestStatusID], [RequestLevelID], [OSS_RequestDecisionID], [RS_RequestDecisionID], [District_RequestDecisionID], [Region_RequestDecisionID], [MCRC_RequestDecisionID], [LastEditDate], [LastEditBy], [ProgramID], [GradDate], [CommissionDate], [ReferenceText] FROM [ACP].[vwRequests] r INNER JOIN [ACP].[ext_MCRISS_O.cerContracts] a ON a.NWA_GUID = r.NWA_GUID INNER JOIN [ACP].[EXT_Recrui.ngOrgs] ro ON a.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = ro.[root] WHERE (@status = 0 OR [RequestStatusID] = @status) AND (@type = 0 OR [RequestTypeID] = @type) AND (@level = 0 OR [RequestLevelID] = @level) AND (@OrgID = 0 OR ro.[HQ] = @OrgID OR ro.[Region] = @OrgID OR ro.[District] = @OrgID OR ro.[RS] = @OrgID OR ro.[OSS] = @OrgID )
